item.title: Somone know how to add this on my name?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

For some servers it’s either:

And for shading the text it’s:

But you’ll have to look, some servers use:

For green, white, blue, black, etc.

If you’re trying to color names when a player types ::yell, it’s probably going to be @gre@,@blu@, etc. server-sided. For names while chatting it’s usually and , and client-sided.

If your client doesn’t have colors added, look at a tutorial for adding it.
